text: Hero – Gayab Mode On was an Indian fantasy television series. It was produced by Peninsula Pictures. THe series was first broadcast on 7 December 2020 on SAB TV. It starred Abhishek Nigam in the title role with Yesha Rughani and Tunisha Sharma. == Plot == The series is about a man who found a ring which gave him supernatural powers. He had to fight alien forces who were after the ring. He had to save the world with the help of his friends and family. ==Cast== * Abhishek Nigam as Veer Nanda/Hero, Zara's love interest and Aditi's husband (2020-2021) * Yesha Rughani as Zara: an aspiring actress and Veer's former love interest (2020-2021) * Tunisha Sharma as ASP Aditi Veer Nanda (née Jammwal): Veer's lover-turned wife (2021) == References == == Other websites == * Hero - Gayab Mode On on Sony SAB Category:Fantasy television series Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2020 Indian television series debuts Category:2020s Indian television series Category:2021 Indian television series endings
title: Hero – Gayab Mode On
